msg: Avoid hanging connection if dispatch fails when shutdowninfo is sent

author: chirino
msg: We now can shutdown a connection that is blocked on send due to queue limits.
Stats tracking code added recently was causing a NPE at times.  Added a gaurd against the NPE

author: chirino
msg: Fix for Memory limits for topics was not returning to normal after it's consumers are disconnected

author: chirino
msg: Continue to send heart beats even if the machine time is falky. Like time going backwards.
